head-content: Luc Schenherr's portfolio, React developer. Luc can assist you with your web development projects. Contact him through the form or via his social networks!
presentation-first-sentence: Passionate about his profession, new technologies
description-first-sentence: With a Master's degree in Production and Logistics, I started in production planning in the pharmaceutical sector, acquiring expertise in project management. My passion for technology then led me to web development, specializing in React.
description-second-sentence: With specialized training in React, I am ready to invest myself in innovative projects, applying my technical skills for effective and high-quality solutions.
description-thrid-sentence: Attracted by technological advances and challenging tasks, my goal is to provide effective and meticulous solutions in my projects.
description-fourth-sentence: Appreciating collaboration, I am open to discussions about innovative projects or ideas in technology.
